recipesJson.name: Mango Yogurt Smoothie Salts MTL/POD
recipesJson.author: shakenvape007
recipesJson.description:
A quick easy mango recipe for your pod or juul. To be used with salt nic, pod, MTL, Juul device.  
Update: Shout out wadeyloops. I did post a DL (direct lung) version on FB chat. Thanks for posting it on ATF comments. 
Check us out on facebook: https://www.facebook.com/groups/456512471380574

FA mango .75
Tpa Greek 1
Flv mango 2.5
Tpa marshmallow .5
Flv Sweetness .15 or super sweet you can use EM or cotton candy if you prefer to blend and remove sharpness of the mangos. 

75vg/25vg 1 to 3 day steep time.

reviews.text: Vaping this out of my zennith right now. Loving every second. Its a little candied but it perfect for the title. added some ws-23 and polar blast and enjoying it even more! Thanks for the awesome recipe.
